text: Makin Island may refer to: ==Places== * Butaritari, an atoll in Kiribati known to U.S. military forces during World War II as "Makin Atoll" and "Makin Island" * Makin (atoll), the local, and now preferred, name for an atoll in Kiribati adjacent to Butaritari, known to U.S. military forces during World War II as "Little Makin" ==Ships== * , a United States Navy escort aircraft carrier in commission from 1944 to 1946 * , a United States Navy amphibious assault ship commissioned in 2009 ==See also== * Makin (disambiguation)
title: Makin Island
